whyUse.title: Why Use Financial Formula?
whyUse.p1: In the world of financial and legal transactions, accuracy is everything. A small mistake in writing a number can lead to significant complications. 'Financial Formula' is designed to be your digital assistant that ensures you write financial amounts in words 100% correctly, giving you confidence and security in all your documents.
whyUse.p2: The tool runs entirely on your device, which means your data never leaves your browser. We adhere to the highest privacy standards; no numbers you enter are collected or stored. This makes it the perfect choice for accountants, lawyers, contract managers, and anyone dealing with sensitive financial documents.
whyUse.b1_text: To ensure the accuracy of checks, invoices, and financial reports.
whyUse.b2_text: To write amounts in contracts and agreements in an unambiguous way.
whyUse.b3_text: To issue commercial documents and deals with confidence and professionalism.
whyUse.b4_text: When writing personal checks or signing lease or sale contracts.
whyUse.p3: With support for various major currencies, 'Financial Formula' provides a comprehensive and reliable solution that goes beyond mere conversion to become an integral part of your daily financial routine.

about.title: About Us
about.p1: Welcome to 'Financial Formula'. We are a team of developers and financial experts who noticed the need for a simple and reliable tool to convert numbers into words for financial and legal purposes.
about.p2: Our goal is to provide a free, easy-to-use, and completely secure tool that helps professionals and individuals alike avoid common mistakes in writing amounts, which can have serious consequences.
about.p3: We believe that accuracy and clarity are the foundation of any successful transaction. Therefore, we have developed our conversion algorithm with great care to ensure it meets the linguistic and accounting standards adopted in official documents.
about.p4: Our main distinguishing feature is our commitment to privacy. 'Financial Formula' is a tool that operates entirely on the client-side, meaning that any data you enter is not sent to or stored on any servers. Your financial security and privacy are our top priority.
about.p5: We hope you find this tool useful in your work and daily life.

section1.content: We unequivocally state that the 'Financial Formula' tool does not collect, store, or share any personal or financial data you enter. All number-to-text conversion processes are performed entirely within your web browser on your local device (Client-Side). None of your information is sent to our servers or any third party.
